description: Perfect for a barbecue or alfresco brunch, this easy Eton mess recipe features raspberries, rosewater, Greek-style yoghurt, and pistachios.
name: Raspberry & Rosewater Eton Mess With Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 50g Woolworths vanilla mini meringues, roughly crushed

recipeInstructions.text: Combine yoghurt, honey, rosewater and vanilla in a medium bowl.
Layer half each of the yoghurt mixture, raspberries, pistachios and meringue into 6 x 1 1/2-cup capacity glasses. Repeat with remaining yoghurt mixture, raspberries, pistachios and meringue. Serve.
